name: Trash Compactor!
description:
You're stuck in a trash compactor! The only way out is the green exit. 

This game was loosely based off that scene from Star Wars IV. (The one where they're stuck in the trash compactor.) 

Gameplay information:
• How to win: get to the green exit!
• Power outages: Sometimes the power will go out, this will lock the exit door, use the interact key to power it back on. 

Controls:
• Camera Look >> Mouse
• Movement >> WASD
• Run >> Left Shift
• Interact >> F
